summary: Implemented a frontend-only sponsored video feed and modal viewer on the Videos page, including mock items, sponsored labeling, and simulated playback progress. However, the diff summary does not show the required generated thumbnail image files being added under frontend/public/assets/generated/.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated ad thumbnail images under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and render them in the Videos tab feed items (do not fetch thumbnails via the backend).
missing_requirements.reason: The feed references `/assets/generated/vibechat-sponsored-*.dim_720x1280.png`, but the diff summary does not include any added image files under `frontend/public/assets/generated/`, so the required thumbnails cannot be confirmed as present.
